function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Use of stepwise regressions"},{"name":"Complex mathematical model"},{"name":"Use of gps, wi-fi, and bluetooth to track user’s movements and interactions."},{"name":"Lack of adoption of available technology in health systems"},{"name":"Use of quantile regression to analyze covid-19 transmission may oversimplify the complex nature of disease diffusion and transmission."},{"name":"Complex model representation may lead to misunderstanding or misinterpretation."},{"name":"Lack of digital monitoring and management systems may hinder the effective implementation of preventive measures and tracking of facility performance."},{"name":"Increased data usage and broadband usage during the pandemic"},{"name":"Resistance to new materials"},{"name":"Dependency on iot sensors for data collection"},{"name":"Dependence on specific operating conditions for uv-c system efficiency"},{"name":"Lack of data for ai models"},{"name":"Potential reliance on a single bio sensor for virus detection"},{"name":"Effect modification by the current working mode"},{"name":"Monitoring of covid-19 patients using gps and bluetooth technology in smartphones"},{"name":"Lack of reliable ai forecasting models"},{"name":"Lack of focus on digital materiality’s impact on innovation in dynamic environments"},{"name":"Use of unproven technology for virus and bacteria elimination on masks and air filtration systems"},{"name":"Reliance on non-contact interaction activities during the covid-19 pandemic"},{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases via iot devices in large buildings or campuses."},{"name":"Reduced effectiveness of contact tracing due to low smartphone penetration, especially among the elderly."},{"name":"Limited access to actionable evidence"},{"name":"Use of 5g robots for covid-19 containment"},{"name":"Smart mobility restrictions may not be effectively implemented, leading to continued spread of the virus through transportation modes."},{"name":"Use of humanoid service robots in retail environments may lead to increased physical interactions and close contact, contributing to the spread of contagious diseases."},{"name":"Lack of trust in virtual human agency and simulated human behaviors may result in skepticism and resistance to using the system for evaluating designs."},{"name":"Verifying the validity of the expert system without considering real-world medical scenarios may result in inaccurate and unreliable early detection results."},{"name":"Complex interconnected subsystems of engineering and construction controls"},{"name":"Lack of adoption and trust in the proposed digital transformation framework architecture."},{"name":"Increased reliance on 5g technology for pandemic control may exacerbate the digital divide, leaving certain populations with limited access to essential services and information."},{"name":"Increased use of ml and ai in service firms may optimize business operations, reducing the need for human involvement and potentially limiting disease transmission through human contact."},{"name":"Incorrect interpretation of iot data may lead to misinformed decision-making"},{"name":"Increased use of digital techniques and technologies in construction may facilitate the spread of misinformation and fake news related to contagious diseases."},{"name":"Overfitting of the model due to prolonged training"},{"name":"Strict requirements and sophisticated underlying technologies for teleservices"},{"name":"Rapid growth in wbe for monitoring infectious disease"},{"name":"Increased reliance on digital channels in the built environment"},{"name":"Integration of knowledge to obtain the danger model"},{"name":"Complexity in programming the monitoring platform may lead to operational errors"},{"name":"Inability of urban big data to capture underlying cause-effect relationships"},{"name":"Concerns about the battery life of smart wearables"},{"name":"Transmitting on-site high-definition images and videos to remote command center in real-time"},{"name":"Potential risk of spreading contagious diseases through the use of shared sensing network and iot devices in the hospital environment."},{"name":"Lack of standardization in metagenomics protocols"},{"name":"Dependence on an expert system for early detection of covid-19 may lead to misdiagnosis and delayed treatment, increasing the risk of disease transmission within the community."},{"name":"Limited validation studies for wearables at the clinical level"},{"name":"Inadequate adoption and implementation of virtual reality technology in healthcare education due to infrastructure limitations or resistance to change."},{"name":"Mismatch between survey and geo-location data in capturing demographic variables"},{"name":"Error in camera height, angle of view, and optics specifications"},{"name":"Presence of extra layers between the backbone and the head neck module may introduce additional complexity and potential points of failure in the model."}]}
